Story.headline: Tradition You Can Taste
Story.p1: It all started in 1985 in a small village in Sicily. Nonna Maria taught us that good gelato needs only three things: fresh milk, the best fruit, and lots of patience.
Story.p2: Today we continue this tradition in Germany. We use no ready-made mixes—every flavor is prepared fresh every morning in our lab behind the shop.

Testimonials.headline: What our guests say
Testimonials.description: We love seeing you happy. Here are a few words from our community.

r1.text: The best pistachio ice cream I've ever had outside of Italy. Incredibly creamy!
r1.author: Julia Müller

r2.text: Finally an ice cream shop that uses real organic ingredients. You can taste the difference immediately.
r2.author: Thomas Weber

r3.text: Perfect espresso and the staff is super friendly. A little piece of holiday.
r3.author: Marco Rossi
